title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Library Management Capabilities Utilizing Team-Based Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Through team collaboration, participants can complete a library operations data analysis project in a digital learning environment (LMS).
Participants can operate a mobile-based library management simulation tool with over 85% accuracy.
Participants can design an optimized book arrangement plan by applying a mathematics-based classification system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
